org.trianacode.gui.hci.tools

Class BrokenToolMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.trianacode.gui.hci.tools.BrokenToolMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ToolListener

    public class BrokenToolMonitor
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ToolListener
    A background thread that constantly checks whether any tools have been broken/ unbroken, repainting the tool tree when a change occurs.
